name: Jolly Jackpot Lotto - Lucky Christmas Scratchers
name_original: Jolly Jackpot Lotto - Lucky Christmas Scratchers
description:
Your Holiday Luck has Arrived!

You can't stop when you're winning and feeling the fun, the excitement and that special rush when you match 3 numbers and win and keep on winning.

You could be a million dollar winner!

Scratching is as easy as swiping with your finger
OR just using the super convenient INSTANT Scratch.

5 Levels of Festive Play for the Holidays!

Each level has different prizes.

Super easy to use when you're busy on the go or just killing time.

Play Jolly Jackpot Lotto - Lucky Christmas Scrathers and get the full on experience of scratching lottery tickets on all your iOS devices.

Play to Win with 5 different Holiday Scratcher themes.

Happy Holidays and Thanks for Playing!
